name: hamlin
description:
Hamlin is a music learning game in the shape of an adventure. Basically you will learn music theory of scales, like major and minor with different base keys. Further you can explore the low-poly world and fight monsters with your knowledge of the scales.

Please give some feedback about the game and tell us if you are interested to follow this project.
